document.full_text: president barack obama is likely to announce plans next week to run for re-election and file campaign papers with the federal election commission as early as monday, a democratic official said saturday.
document.title: obama likely to announce re-election bid next week
lines_and_colors: president barack obama is likely to announce plans next week to run for re-election and file campaign papers with the federal election commission as early as monday, a democratic official said saturday.
